description: Get the position information for a given resource.

parameters.name: ResourceIdentifier
parameters.description: Resource identifier used to retrieve the position information.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: Resource type of the resource for which position information is retrieved.

nested_items.name: Position
nested_items.description: The position information of the resource.

nested_items.name: HorizontalAccuracy
nested_items.description: The horizontal accuracy of the estimated position, which is the difference between the estimated location and the actual device location.

nested_items.name: VerticalAccuracy
nested_items.description: The vertical accuracy of the estimated position, which is the difference between the estimated altitude and actual device latitude in meters.

nested_items.name: SolverType
nested_items.description: The type of solver used to identify the position of the resource.

nested_items.name: SolverProvider
nested_items.description: The vendor of the positioning solver.

nested_items.name: SolverVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the positioning solver.

nested_items.name: Timestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the device's position was determined.
